attributes.action: to make all carvans pay road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
all carvans should pay a min road tax of £50.00 per year.
this because of the cost towing  to the environment the big four bye fours that are used to tow them us more fuel
